Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital other

Exercise of Stock Options: issuance of common stock upon net exercise of common stock warrants and other shares
issuance of common stock upon net exercise of common stock warrants and other value
issuance of common stock upon net exercise of common stock warrants shares
issuance of common stock upon net exercise of common stock warrants value
settlement of employee loan stock option modification value
settlement of employee loan stock option modificationshares
stock issued during period shares stock options exercised
stock issued during period value stock options exercised
Other Stock Issuance: conversion of redeemable convertible preferred stock to common stock value
conversion of redeemable shares convertible preferred stock to common stock
stock issued during period shares conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period value conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period shares new issues
stock issued during period value new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
stock issued during period shares growth units vested
stock issued during period shares restricted stock award net of forfeitures
stock issued during period shares share based compensation
stock issued during period value growth units vested
stock issued during period value restricted stock award net of forfeitures
stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: treasury stock retired cost method amount
treasury stock value acquired cost method
